title: Premier League App
desc: My first React app. It shows the current English Premier League table & standings, which updates after every game. It also shows information about clubs, such as rosters, previous fixtures, upcoming fixtures, etc. I used the combination of class-based and functional components, as well as react-router. App is hosted on Netlify, and it uses football-data.org API.

title: Mini NBA App
desc: Second React app from the category of sport. This time I used only functional components with React hooks. Of course, there is also the react-router. The emphasis of this app is on the player's stats, but there is also basic info about teams and the upcoming games. It's also hosted on Netlify, and it uses balldontlie.io API.
